climbs.name: Yellow Marrow
climbs.fa: Dylan Oliver, Chris Cullaz, Conor Mark 5/14

content.description: Begin on the splitter crack shared with Red Marrow, just off the trail. Instead of breaking left over the ledge, skirt it's right end and stay in the corner, making a tricky move past a bulge half way, and another tricky bulge to gain the top. Move up to a sling on a tree.
content.protection: Standard rack to #4 camalot, large stoppers.

climbs.name: Red Marrow
climbs.fa: Conor Mark, Dylan Oliver, Chris Cullaz

content.description: Begin on the splitter right off the trail. At the top of the crack, move left to a ledge at chest height. Grunt past branches (nut) onto ledge. Up the crack/corner past a chockstone that appears to be a death block from below (but is solid). Move right through an alcove, and swing out right into the sweet and airy hand crack. Up the crack past a wedged block at the lip. Rap from slings.
content.location: ~350ft. left of Bone Appetite Rap from slings at the top of the cliff, a 70m makes it to the ground, somehow.

content.description:
Home to Red Marrow and Yellow Marrow with room for new routes to the right. 

USUALLY CLOSED IN SPRING FOR PEREGRINE FALCON NESTING
